Testimonials_description: In short, the bootcamp excels on the curriculum, providing guidance, and career services. I found this bootcamp online, and I decided to go for this one because of the curriculum and the feel of it during the assessment process. I wanted to move a step forward in my career by learning Data Science and Machine Learning. What I liked is that the coursework is tailored to each person depending on their experience

footer_link.decription: Pathsetter is an upskilling and hiring platform for emerging tech talent. We are founded by a young and passionate team comprising of HBS, ISB, IIT and NIT graduates.
